Package gg.acai.aurora.earlystop

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    EarlyStop
    Early stopping performs a check on model performance and terminates training if a certain condition is met.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CycleBuffer
    A simple buffer for cycle-based early stopping.
    EarlyStoppers
    A house-holding class for early stoppers.
    PrecisionHalt
    A precision halt stops the training process when the target accuracy is reached.
    Stagnation
    A stagnation early stopper terminating the epoch iteration when the model stagnates (accuracy does not improve).
